lines.text: Why don't you get a toupee with some brains in it!
Remind me to tear out your Adam's apple!
I'll make a note of it.
[pulls out a pad of paper and a pencil]

[as stuffy butler, speaking into telephone]
Is this Susquehanna, two-two-two-two?

[on doctors' switchboard]
Too-too-too-too? What do ya think you're doin', bub, playing train?

[to the Stooges]
Come, gentlemen. Last one in is a Republican!
